TopicTitle: Wheels Jumping Off Runway on Physics Load

Articles.Content:
Hello Forums!

I'm having an infuriating problem with my airplane. Whenever I start a flight, the wheels start out in the runway. When the physics starts, the wheels jump out of the runway and launch the plane into the air, causing crashes, death, and destruction. Anybody encountered this before?

Make sure the wheels aren't clipping through the floor in the SPH. (Click the root part or shift click any part to move the entire craft.)

Also, welcome the the forums!

Are you playing on a console, or on PC? And if PC, which game version?

Edited August 23, 2017 by bewing
